entity.name: question
entity.query: SELECT 'QUESTION' AS TYPE, concat('QUESTION_', QUES_ID) AS ID, QUES_TITLE AS TITLE, COM_RICH_TEXT.TEXT_CONTENT AS BODY FROM COM_QUESTION INNER JOIN COM_RICH_TEXT WHERE COM_QUESTION.QUES_BODY = COM_RICH_TEXT.TEXT_ID;
